features: A style not to be missed!
Self-storage pocket to make it packable
Openings on both sides to improve breathability.
Made of fabric UPF>50 (98% UV Protection).

* Samples of fabrics have been tested for UV protection by LEITAT-Textile Technology Institutes in accordance with the standard AS/NZS 4399:1996 “Sun protective clothing Evaluation and Classifcation”, results achieving UPF>50 (98% UV protection).
